content:
# Report

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Furnace at position(x)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (position x1)

### Coal extraction area at position(x)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position x2)
- Beltgroup (position x3) connecting the burner mining drill to the furnace at position x1

### Iron plate production area at position(x)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (position x1)
- Assembling machine (position x4)
- Inserter (position x5) that puts into the assembling machine
- Beltgroup (position x6) connecting the furnace at position x1 to the assembling machine at position x4

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when crafting items due to insufficient resources
- Ensure that you have enough required ingredients in your inventory before attempting to craft items. For example, you need iron plates to craft iron gear wheels.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting to place it.
